name: CancelLoyaltyPromotion
description:
Cancel a scheduled or active loyalty promotion program early.

This tool cancels a loyalty promotion, setting its status to 'CANCELED'. Use it to end an 'ACTIVE' or 'SCHEDULED' promotion earlier than the scheduled end date or when no end date is specified. It is also useful for canceling a promotion before creating a new one, as updates to promotions are not supported.

parameters.name: loyalty_promotion_id
parameters.description: The ID of the loyalty promotion to cancel. Applicable for promotions with 'ACTIVE' or 'SCHEDULED' status.

value_schema.description:
The ID of the [loyalty promotion](entity:LoyaltyPromotion) to cancel. You can cancel a
promotion that has an `ACTIVE` or `SCHEDULED` status.

parameters.name: loyalty_program_id
parameters.description: The ID of the base loyalty program to be canceled. This is required to identify the program associated with the promotion.

value_schema.description: The ID of the base [loyalty program](entity:LoyaltyProgram).
